competition_context.notes: Three established weapons will challenge Burden for targets. He may open as WR3/slot-only.
Vacated over 200+ targets. Hunter's elite profile and draft capital point to immediate WR1 opportunity. Brian Thomas Jr provides elite WR1 target comparison.
Achane's role in short passing game reduced Waddle's target ceiling. WR2s in RB-heavy systems require adjusted expectations.
